## CurrentGame class

A representation of an ongoing game.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CurrentGame 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(client, data)](./shieldbow.currentgame._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>CurrentGame</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [id](./shieldbow.currentgame.id.md) |  | number | The numerical ID of the game.<!-- -->Combining this with the [CurrentGame.platform](./shieldbow.currentgame.platform.md) gives the full ID of the game. The full ID can be used to fetch all the details of the match after it has ended using [MatchManager.fetch()](./shieldbow.matchmanager.fetch.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [length](./shieldbow.currentgame.length.md) |  | number | The amount of time (in seconds) that has passed since the game started. |
|  [map](./shieldbow.currentgame.map.md) |  | [GameMap](./shieldbow.gamemap.md) | The map on which the game is being played. |
|  [mode](./shieldbow.currentgame.mode.md) |  | [GameMode](./shieldbow.gamemode.md) | The game mode. |
|  [observerKey](./shieldbow.currentgame.observerkey.md) |  | string | The observer key for the game. |
|  [platform](./shieldbow.currentgame.platform.md) |  | string | The platform (server) on which the game is being played. |
|  [queue](./shieldbow.currentgame.queue.md) |  | [Queue](./shieldbow.queue.md) | The type of queue for the game. |
|  [startTimestamp](./shieldbow.currentgame.starttimestamp.md) |  | number | The time at which the game started. |
|  [teams](./shieldbow.currentgame.teams.md) |  | Collection&lt;'red' \| 'blue', [CurrentGameTeam](./shieldbow.currentgameteam.md)<!-- -->&gt; | A collection of the participating teams. |
|  [type](./shieldbow.currentgame.type.md) |  | [GameType](./shieldbow.gametype.md) | The type of game. |
